node.title: Signature of the Designer: Seeing God Through the Creation
node.description: The way in which this planet is designed to support life is of such complexity and beauty that it provides a deeper appreciation for the days of Creation. This presentation will discuss how science can be used as a witnessing tool for the great Designer of the universe. As we see the design that was built into this world, it reduces the chances of "chance" being a viable explanation for our planetary home.
